name: Mag Maze
description:
Mag Maze is a challenging 3d platformer. Explore the secret world of the coins we never knew existed. 15-45 min of gameplay

While the game does accept keyboard input, a game controller is strongly recommended.

Use your mouse to navigate menus, controller menu support is on the to do list.

Gameplay Instructions
Gamepad: 
Move - Analog sticks 
Pause- Menu button

Keyboard:
Move: wasdqe and/or arrow keys
Pause - P key
